text: At a glance, the skiff may seem to be ineffective in battle, but it is protected by several Djinns who will fiercely defend their master.
When sieging enemy walled settlements, this unit gets a sizeable missile damage bonus.
This unit is a Djinn. It is classified as "Daemonic" for gameplay purposes.
The Djinn Carriage transports 4 vessels, each containing a powerful Djinn. It can only summon 1 of the 4 Djinn in each battle.
Spinning recklessly when charging and fighting out of zealous adoration  for the Djinn, the Dervishes will fight harder and reflect attacks even as their zealotry causes their defense to drop.
This Arabyan unit comes from a desert nomad tribe. These nomads are known for their quick hit and run tactics.
